Package org.yamcs.client

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BulkRestDataReceiver  
    ConnectionListener
    A connection listener interface for clients connecting to a yamcs server.
    WebSocketClientCallback  
    WebSocketResponseHandler
    Handlers the response for one specific message that was sent.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BulkRestDataSender
    Used to post large quantities of data to yamcs.
    CertUtil  
    HttpClient  
    InstanceClient  
    ProcessorControlClient
    controls processors in yamcs server via websocket
    RestClient
    A simple Yamcs Rest client to help with basic requests.
    RestEventProducer
    An EventProducer that publishes events over the web api By default, repeated message are detected and reduced, resulting in pseudo events with a message like 'last event repeated X times'.
    WebSocketClient
    Netty-implementation of a Yamcs web socket client
    WebSocketClientHandler  
    WebSocketRequest
    Tags anything to be sent upstream on an established websocket.
    YamcsClient
    WIP Intended to provide a typed java-based client for use in CLI or other clients.
    YamcsConnector
    This is like a WebsocketClient but performs reconnection and implements some callbacks to announce the state. to be used by all the gui data receivers (event viewer, archive browser, etc)
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    WebSocketExecutionException
    Use by the WebSocketClient for the exceptions received via the websocket interface
